page.title: 09Stibbard Methodist Chapel
page.content: The Methodist Church at Stibbard is part of the Fakenham and Wells Circuit and is served by a Superintendent Minister, the Reverend Arthur Kirkman based at Fakenham. The meetings for worship, held at 11.00am each Sunday are attended by about 12 people, and are led, either by the minister or a local preacher. A Sunday School meets at the same time as the adult congregation, leaving for their own lessons in the schoolroom after the first 15 minutes. Each service would consist of 4 or 5 hymns with prayers, and readings from the Old and New Testaments.
